In response too mister lainheart. i did just read the whole thing, as a form of respect for your comment. and i still hate it with a passion. the idea of a woman being stolen from her duties and loved ones by a outsider preying on her fleeting passions is disgusting. it is difficult too explain and likely has something too do with my own inner fears but none the less, i HATE all men and woman who enjoy this kind of story. if you like the idea of having this happen too your loved ones then you are unquestionably beyond my comprehension. i LITERALLY just cant understand you. and if you get off on the idea of DOING this too someone then your even further beyond my understanding. because the lack of empathy you would have too have to do this too a woman and by extension her family is appalling and unimaginable. i don't agree with the whole "kill yourself" phrase that everyone is using, that's just their rage and frustration boiling out. but i have no forgiveness for any who like this.
